doc.title: Gil's Choice
doc.plot: A fledgling film director, Gil, befriends the son of NYC Yakuza crime boss, Motomasa, and he soon discovers that the man wants out of the family. He reveals his past and a secret that can crumble the organization from the inside. But family turns on family and friends turn on friends. Was it all a big set-up? A cover up? A test? Who do you trust and what choice do you make?
